title: Skeleton Commando
summaries: The Skeleton Commando is a rare Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Skeleton Commandos slowly approach the player, and, upon getting within their line of sight, stop in place before firing Rockets that explode upon contact with the player or with solid blocks.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades.

The Skeleton Commando spawns most often in areas of the Dungeon backed by <linked>Brick Walls</linked>, along with <linked>Blue Armored Bones</linked> and <linked>Necromancers</linked>. Removing these naturally occurring back walls will prevent these enemies from spawning, but they can be respawned by placing <linked>Cursed Dungeon Brick Walls</linked>. These areas can further be identified by the presence of <linked>Necromantic Signs</linked> and <linked>Marching Bones Banners</linked>, but these banners are purely indicative and do not influence spawning.
